short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject your own CSS code into a website of choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this add on for chrome will allow you to save the changes you have made to a websites css code. we think you should install it because it will allow you to change what any website looks like and save your changes too.
